channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-4302] HL7 on NETTY4 transport layer does not work with jboss-eap
item.description:
HL7 on NETTY4 transport layer does not work with jboss-eap.

It cannot find class org.apache.camel.component.netty4.DefaultChannelHandlerFactory.
My MANIFEST.MF file contains "Dependencies:" including those modules "org.apache.camel.component.netty4,io.netty:4.0".

Stacktrace:

item.summary: HL7 on NETTY4 transport layer does not work with jboss-eap

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi Thomas,

Your patch [1] does not work. It gives mi an error with this message:
Caused by: org.jboss.modules.ModuleLoadError: io.netty:main

You have to specify version/slot of io.netty module dependency:
<dependencies>
....
<module name="io.netty" slot="4.0"/>

[1] https://github.com/wildfly-extras/wildfly-camel/commit/2c1502c08310517671cbc8233e0d400cc597d4e1

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
1. install fuse-eap-installer-6.2.1.redhat-070.jar to jboss-eap-6.4.1
2. deploy some application with camel route using those beans:
